chapter.title: Smooks Source Editor Page
chapter.para: This section provides information about Smooks Source Editor Page.

section.title: XML Source Editor
section.para: You can use this editor to edit the Smooks Configuration file directly.

section.title: Error Messages GUI
section.para: If the Smooks tools can't understand the configuration file or the configuration file is illegal (XML structure isn't right for Smooks Configuration file, etc.), the error is underlined.
We hope, our guide will help you to get started with JBoss Smooks Tools. Besides, for additional information you are welcome on JBoss forum.
